Yeah, Inferno. Some of us are offended by that language, so go f*** yourself 
(LOL).

Anyways, about the argument between Thecode and Crow Lord: Thecode has a 
point. Suukie was already in the CR chamber. And as Thecode mentioned, there 
is a shield aroung the base. But just for future refference, if Suukies parts 
were laying around still, Crow Lord could have taken them and it wouldn't 
have been moding, since Suukie is disabled.
